invalid_deploy_action_package_help.desc: Have deploy_action() return the help for package

invalid_deploy_action_filters_help.desc: Have deploy_action() return the help for filters

invalid_deploy_action_options_help.desc: Have deploy_action() return the help for options

invalid_deploy_action_run_false.desc: Deploy an action without run=True, which will only run the pre-deploy action question that matches action_filters, export the results to a file, and raise a RunFalse exception

invalid_deploy_action_missing_parameters.desc: Deploy an action using a package that requires parameters but do not supply any parameters.
invalid_deploy_action_missing_parameters.error_str: parameter key.*requires a value, parameter definition

invalid_deploy_action_empty_package.desc: Deploy an action using an empty package string.
invalid_deploy_action_empty_package.error_str: '' must be a string supplied as 'package'

invalid_deploy_action_package.desc: Deploy an action using a non-existing package.
